songs.title: ​Diwana
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Gal Gal te seena zori
Bhang mei leke fira naal jada peeva thodi
Gaddi ch betha mai navaab meri latta chaudi
Bola mai sach loki kehnde meri galla kaudi
Bhang da rajja mainu kudiya de call aun
Jo vi mai manga mere waaste oh len jaan
Ghatt to ghat pava RocaWear Sean-John
ECKO di jutti meri beanie meri Phat Farm
Jind jawani hor jeen di lod nahi
Lahu ch nasha menu peen di lod ni
Dil di manna manu deen di lod nahi
Maut de agge mere hor koi mod nahi
Mere to door rehnde munde mere haan de
Menu policewaale naa to pachande
Nashe ch gede maara kabarastan de
Yara nu chakkeya rabba meinu vi aan de

[Chorus]
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...

[Verse 2]
Galla galla ch main dassa(10)sala piche challa
Dassa tuhanu kiven shuru kiti meine eh zindagani
Shuru shuru ch na sharab na bhang
Na kise to tang na paise da ghum na mera dil nam
Sola saala da si mai bhang pehli waari pe mei
Kado shuru kiti sharab bhala dassa ki mai
Valaiti munda desi vekhan menu pardesi
Gore te kaaleya di dunia ch bhala ki mei
Lang gaye yaar, mere yara nu kara mein wade
Maut naal kheda mein theek ne mere irade
School ch sikheya kakh mei likheya sach
Mein baneya ajj jo vi baneya mei appe bhajj
Kehna asaan aukha karke vikhana
Menu yaar kende raah fateh chakk de jawana
Mei pichde di ni sochda hun sida agge jana
Ave mera jamana menu rok ke dikhana..

[Chorus]
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...

[Verse 3]
Jeeva mei jind jee ke jagg te ehsaan kara
Bhang peeke sareya nu pareshan kara
Raata mei jaaga rava gharo mai bahar
Betha studio de wich baje subah de chaar
Menu loki kehnde raah peeni chadd de tu bhang
Bhange peeye bina mera challe ni kalam
Nale lagda ni mann menu rabb di kasam
Menu andro khaan vichde yara de ghum
Utto police piche lagge mere thanedar
Je mai fadeya gaya te Bail meri das hazar
Meri bhedi adta da mai ape va jimmedar
Nashe ch khalota kara police da hun intezar
Menu thane ch pa dao
Sire jurmane la dao
Janma da paapi mei
Menu sooli charha dao
Ya fer cheer ke mera sina kado dil baar
Mei kalla ni aape to baar mere warge hazar

[Chorus]
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
Mein diwana mere mooh na lagoo...
